maya/beastmayaplugin/include/texturetarget.h

#ifndef BEAST_TEXTURE_TARGET_H
#define BEAST_TEXTURE_TARGET_H

#include "target.h"
#include "pass.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"

#include <maya/MObject.h>

namespace beastmaya {

struct TargetResult;

class TextureEntity : public Entity {
public:
        TextureEntity(const MObject& instance, const MObject& entity, const std::wstring& uvSet);
        void setTexelScale(float scale);
        void setTextureResolution(int width, int height);
        void exportEntity(BeastTarget& target);
        void importEntity(TargetResult& result);
private:
        enum ETextureEntitySizeType {
                SIZE_TYPE_NONE,
                SIZE_TYPE_SCALE,
                SIZE_TYPE_RESOLUTION
        };
        std::wstring m_uvSet;
        ETextureEntitySizeType m_sizeType;
        float m_texelScale;
        int m_textureWidth, m_textureHeight;
};

typedef std::shared_ptr<TextureEntity> TextureEntityPtr;

class TextureTarget : public Target {
public:
        TextureTarget(const MObject& targetNode, int width, int height, bool atlas, int padding, bool atlasRescale, float atlasThreshold);
        ~TextureTarget() {};

        void addEntity(TextureEntityPtr& entity);
        void addPass(PassPtr& pass);

        void exportTarget(BeastJob& job);
        void importTarget();

private:
        bool m_atlas;
        bool m_atlasRescale;
        float m_atlasThreshold;
        int m_padding;
        std::vector<TextureEntityPtr> m_entities;
        std::vector<PassPtr> m_passes;
        
        // Maya API
        
        // Beast API
        int m_width, m_height;
};

typedef std::shared_ptr<TextureTarget> TextureTargetPtr;

}

#endif // BEAST_TEXTURE_TARGET_H
